item.title: How to install Adobe Air applications on Android Emulator
item.dc:creator: robert
item.description: I’ve been searching for hours trying to figure out how to install Adobe Air applications on Android Emulator. I found a good simple article and would like to share. Check it out: Insall AIR on Android Emulator
item.content:encoded: I’ve been searching for hours trying to figure out how to install Adobe Air applications on Android Emulator. I found a good simple article and would like to share. Check it out: Insall AIR on Android Emulator
